stochastic gradient descent.from sentence: To train the model we used stochastic gradient descent with the ADAM update rule and learning rate of 0.001 or 0.0005 .

GRU networks.from sentence: Weights in the GRU networks were initialized by random orthogonal matrices and biases were initialized to zero .

used.from sentence: We also used a gradient clipping threshold of 10 and batches of size 32 .
